ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC UK  Junior Business Analyst  September 2021 - Present  Manchester, UK  In my role at HSBC, I have been instrumental in supporting various business units by gathering and analyzing requirements. I conduct in-depth data analysis using Excel and SQL, providing actionable insights that guide business decisions. I also assist in the preparation of detailed reports and presentations for stakeholders, ensuring clear communication of findings. Additionally, I have been involved in identifying areas for process improvement, contributing to solutions that enhance operational efficiency.  NatWest Group  Business Analyst Intern  July 2020 - August 2021  Manchester, UK  During my internship at NatWest, I worked closely with senior analysts to collect and document business requirements for several projects. I performed data analysis tasks, generating reports that supported strategic planning. My role also involved assisting in process improvement initiatives, helping to identify inefficiencies and develop solutions. This experience allowed me to hone my analytical and communication skills, preparing me for a full-time role in business analysis.
